title: column Oilers in playoff spot at season pause helped by meeting, GM says - NHL.com
description: column Oilers in playoff spot at season pause helped by meeting, GM says NHL.com Best Moments From The 2019-20 Battle Of Alberta Games SPORTSNET The strong economic enticements for the Edmonton Oilers to return to the ice post-COVID-19 as soon as humanly poss…
content: The Edmonton Oilers were in a great position to reach the Stanley Cup Playoffs when the NHL season was paused March 12, and a meeting near the end of December likely played a big part. On Dec. 27, general manager Ken Holland, assistant general manager Keith G… [+5333 chars]
